entry.title: WINTER STORM WATCH , St. Catharines
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:00 PM EST Thursday 02 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, -0.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: St. Catharines / Niagara District Airport 9:00 PM EST Thursday 02 March 2023
Condition: Mostly Cloudy
Temperature: -0.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.6 kPa rising
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 90 %
Wind Chill: -3
Dewpoint: -2.1°C
Wind: SSW 7 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 3

entry.title: Thursday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 6:33 PM EST Thursday 02 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Rain mixed with snow. High plus 5.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Rain mixed with snow at times heavy beginning late in the afternoon. Wind becoming east 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. High plus 5. Wind chill minus 10 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 6:33 PM EST Thursday 02 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow at times heavy or rain. Low plus 1.
entry.summary: Rain mixed with snow at times heavy changing to snow at times heavy and blowing snow in the evening. Snowfall amount 10 to 20 cm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 late in the evening then becoming northeast 20 gusting to 40 after midnight. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 6:33 PM EST Thursday 02 March 2023
